cause.description:
Take the Green Living Challenge! Organized by Arlingtonians for a Clean Environment, the Challenge will help you take small steps to make a major reduction in your environmental impact.
http://www.arlingtonenvironment.org/greenchallenge/index.htm
1. Minor changes can add up to make a major environmental impact.
2. Most people aren't aware of the choices available that can reduce their carbon footprint.
3. Take the Green Living Challenge and help build a healthier, more sustainable community!
cause.mission: Make big cuts in your carbon footprint without making big changes in your lifestyle!
cause.name: Green Living Challenge
